---
description: Start Next.js development server
allowed-tools:
  - Bash
---

# /preview - Next.js Development Server

Start the development server for local preview.

## Command

```bash
npm run dev
```

## Default Port

Port 3000 (or next available if busy).

## Notes

- Hot reload enabled by default
- Turbopack enabled if available (Next.js 16+)
- Access at http://localhost:3000
